Question: Lumentum CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Lumentum

Product: Lumentum CES 2024

- Lumentum announced its fiscal first quarter 2024 financial results with net revenue of $317.6 million and GAAP net loss of $67.9 million.
- The company introduced a 130+ GBaud Smart Transmitter Receiver Optical Sub-Assembly (TROSA), 800G ZR+, and 0dBm 400G ZR+ compact transceivers to address the increasing data traffic driven by AI and ML applications.
- These optical solutions support the rapid influx of data traffic and increasing bandwidth requirements in cloud data centers.
- Lumentum also presented insights on the next era of optical networking, focusing on Carrier and Spatial Division Multiplexing (CSDM) during the LITE 2023 Investor Event.
- The company showcased its innovative optical solutions at the European Conference on Optical Communication (ECOC) 2023, including live demonstrations of the new products.

For more information, visit www.lumentum.com.
Summary_cn:
Lumentum

产品: Lumentum CES 2024

- Lumentum宣布其2024财年第一季度财务业绩，净收入为3.176亿美元，GAAP净亏损为6790万美元。
- 公司推出了130+ GBaud智能发射接收器光子组件（TROSA）、800G ZR+和0dBm 400G ZR+紧凑型收发器，以满足人工智能和机器学习应用驱动的日益增长的数据流量。
- 这些光学解决方案支持云数据中心中迅猛增长的数据流量和不断增长的带宽需求。
- Lumentum还在LITE 2023投资者活动期间介绍了关于光网络下一个时代的见解，重点是载波和空间分频复用（CSDM）。
- 公司在2023年欧洲光通信大会（ECOC）展示了其创新的光学解决方案，包括新产品的现场演示。

欲了解更多信息，请访问 www.lumentum.com。
